Description:
Participate in developing pricing strategies for increasing profit.
Implementation of different pricing strategies to increase profit.
Choosing promotional tactics based on the target market and ensuring their effective execution.
Analyze the sales data and go through customer surveys and their purchasing patterns to evaluate the effectiveness of the marketing strategies.Skills
Skills:
Able to deal with suppliers, consumers and distributors.
Must be well-versed in various advertising methods.
Must possess the skills and experience in customer and distributor management.
Must be able to handle the suppliers, distributors, and customers on a regular basis.
